February 15, 1956
Dr. H. E. Williams, President
Southern College
Walnut Ridge, Arkansas
Dear Dr. Williams:
Miss Marguerite Fleming, Manager, Station KSLH, has asked us to send you
some information and materials concerning the NAEB.
I am enclosing some brief descriptive materials, and, under separata cover,
am sending samples of some of the reports, surveys and other publications
we issue from time to time.
Qualifications for the three membership categories are listed on the en¬
closed mimeographed sheet. If Southern College does regular educational
broadcasting over some station, either commercial or educational, the
College would be eligible for ssociate status. If not, you might be
interested in applying for Affiliate membership, either for the College
or for yourself as an individual. The annual dues for both types of mem¬
bership are $10, including a subscription to our monthly Newsletter,
back issues of which are included in the material being sentT. I am also
sending application blanks for Associate and Affiliate membership, should
you desire to use them.
If Southern College is planning on operating an educational radio or tele¬
vision station we shall be glad to lend any assistance possible to help
you with such planning. In the meantime, if you have any questions, after
you*ve had an opportunity to look over the materials, please let me know.
Sincerely,
Harold E. Hill
Associate Director
